headline: Accenture Links New Communications Leadership And Black Duck Deal To AI Story
summary: Accenture (NYSE:ACN) has created a new Chief Communications Officer role and appointed Rachel Frey to the position. Frey will join the Global Management Committee, expanding the company’s top leadership group. Accenture has also entered a managed security service provider agreement with Black Duck to support its application security services. Accenture is making these leadership and service moves at a time when its shares trade at $224.23. The stock has seen a 40.9% decline over the past...
